price: 你问问在你之前所派遣的我的众使者，我曾否在至仁主之外指定许多神灵供人崇拜。
arabic: وَسۡـَٔلۡ مَنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَآ أَجَعَلۡنَا مِن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ءَالِهَةٗ يُعۡبَدُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wasal man arsalnā min qablika min rusulinā ajaʿalnā min dūni al-raḥmāni ālihatan yuʿ'badūna
